title: Tarka the otter
creator_credit: Rank Organisation Film Productions and David Cobham
brief_description: Adapted from Henry Williamson’s 1927 novel. Traces the life of Tarka from birth through a series of adventures until its eventual confrontation with humans. Narrated by Peter Ustinov.
creator_credit_for_label: Rank Organisation Film Productions and David Cobham
